title: Bug: OrbitControls 404 error preventing scene from rendering
description: OrbitControls.js failing to load with 404 error. Need to use correct CDN path for controls.
close_reason: Fixed by switching from jsdelivr to unpkg CDN which has correct OrbitControls.js path

title: Phase 3: Interaction System - Click and drag mechanics
close_reason: Implemented raycasting, click/hover interactions, piece selection with visual feedback, and cell targeting

title: Add opacity toggle button for goblets
close_reason: Opacity toggle button already implemented - toggles between crystal transparent and opaque modes

title: Phase 1: Core Game State - Implement data structures
close_reason: Implemented complete game state with board, pieces, move validation, and win detection

title: Bug: Should be able to click opponent's piece directly to cover it
description: Players should be able to click directly on opponent's smaller piece to cover it, not just click the cell around it
close_reason: Fixed by adding logic to redirect opponent piece clicks to handleCellClick when piece is selected

title: Bug: Same-size reserve pieces are colliding
description: Pieces of same size in reserves are positioned at same location causing collision/overlap
close_reason: Fixed by spacing reserve pieces 1.5 units apart horizontally instead of 0.5 units on Z axis

title: Change font to DynaPuff
close_reason: DynaPuff font already implemented and applied to all UI elements

title: Phase 4: Game Logic - Turn-based flow
close_reason: Implemented turn-based gameplay, piece placement/movement, gobbling mechanics, stack visibility, and win condition checking

title: Phase 5: Animations & Polish - Smooth transitions
close_reason: Implemented smooth piece movement animations with bezier curves, win animations with pulsing glow, and polished UI feedback

title: Bug: Three.js not loading - scene not rendering
description: Initial implementation had incorrect Three.js CDN paths causing scene not to render. Fixed by using UMD build and adding load event listener.
close_reason: Fixed by using correct Three.js UMD CDN paths and adding window load event listener

title: Bug: Pieces should nest inside each other not stack above
description: When larger piece covers smaller, it should nest inside (gobbling) not float above
close_reason: Fixed by removing stackHeight calculation - pieces now nest at ground level

title: Fix highlighting - only selected piece should glow
close_reason: Fixed highlighting to only glow the specific selected piece by comparing piece IDs instead of object references

title: 3D Gobblet Gobblers Game - Complete Implementation
close_reason: Complete 3D Gobblet Gobblers game implemented with all phases, features, and enhancements

title: Bug: OrbitControls still 404 with unpkg - need ES modules
description: OrbitControls.js doesn't exist at examples/js path. Need to switch to ES modules approach.
close_reason: Fixed by switching to ES modules with importmap - OrbitControls now loads from jsm/ directory

title: Phase 2: 3D Scene Setup - Three.js scene configuration
close_reason: Implemented Three.js scene with camera, OrbitControls, crystal lighting setup, board geometry, and goblet pieces

title: Add light mode toggle with pink board
close_reason: Light mode toggle already implemented with pink (#FFC2E0) background and inverted colors
